name: Off the Grid (tenzaburdo)
description:
This game was done with the help of LERPish for the 12th jam hosted by Curdle.

The main programming and UI was done by me, all the models and some programming by LERPish. Music was done by Rusty-Fishburger and the narrator was Deckard.

CurdleGames hosted the Jam: https://itch.io/jam/curdle-jam-12

LERPish: https://lerpish.itch.io/

Rusty: https://rusty-fishburger.itch.io/

Curdle: https://curdlegames.itch.io/

The eyes used for the game came from this site: https://www.thinglink.com/scene/796888203595350017 Every other texture was done by LERPish.
